TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionStringsExpressionEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditor

summary.span: 提供用于选择在设计时与控件属性关联的数据连接表达式的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for selecting a data connection expression that is associated with a control property at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化设计器主机，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用类，以选择从连接字符串`connectionStrings`配置节。A visual designer host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to select a connection string from the `connectionStrings` configuration section. 类派生自类，并且在从其派生尽管它是公共出于技术原因，但没有什么特别的用处。The class is derived from the class, and although it is public for technical reasons, there is no advantage in deriving from it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EvaluateExpression (string expression, object parseTimeData, Type propertyType, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EvaluateExpression(string expression, object parseTimeData, class System.Type propertyType, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function EvaluateExpression (expression As String, parseTimeData As Object, propertyType As Type, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ EvaluateExpression(System::String ^ expression, System::Object ^ parseTimeData, Type ^ propertyType, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 要计算的连接字符串表达式。

span.span: A connection string expression to evaluate.

param.span: 该表达式不包含 表达式前缀。

span.span: The expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: parseTimeData
param.span: 一个包含附加分析信息（用以计算表达式）的对象。

span.span: An object containing additional parsing information for evaluating the expression.
The type of the control property.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 计算连接字符串表达式并提供控件属性的设计时值。

span.span: Evaluates a connection string expression and provides the design-time value for a control property.

returns.span: 如果表达式计算成功，则为由计算的表达式字符串引用的对象；否则为 。

span.span: The object referenced by the evaluated expression string if the expression evaluation succeeded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法查找连接名称和指定类型`expression`，然后返回连接。The method looks up the connection name and type specified by `expression`, and then returns the connection. 可视化设计器使用方法来计算的连接字符串表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供的设计时值。The visual designer uses the method to evaluate a connection string expression and provide the design-time value for an associated control property. 可视化设计器使用方法，以便分析表达式字符串在设计时，，然后调用用已分析的表达式数据的方法。The visual designer uses the method to parse the expression string at design time, and then calls the method with the parsed expression data. 可视化设计器使用该计算的表达式的结果来指定控件在设计图面呈现的属性值。The visual designer uses the evaluated expression result to assign control property values that are rendered on the design surface. 在运行时，页分析器使用和方法的相应实现来计算表达式，并为关联的控件属性提供的运行时间值。At run time, the page parser uses the and methods of the corresponding implementation to evaluate an expression and provide the run-time value for an associated control property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet (string expression, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet GetExpressionEditorSheet(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpressionEditorSheet (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As ExpressionEditorSheet
public: override System::Web::UI::Design::ExpressionEditorSheet ^ GetExpressionEditorSheet(System::String ^ expression, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);

param.name: expression
param.span: 为控件属性设置的表达式字符串，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: The expression string set for a control property, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.span: 该表达式不包含 表达式前缀。

span.span: The expression does not include the expression prefix.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 返回连接字符串表达式的表达式编辑器表。

span.span: Returns an expression editor sheet for a connection string expression.

returns.span: 一个定义连接字符串表达式属性的 实例。

span.span: An instance that defines the connection string expression properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回编辑器连接字符串表达式的表实现。The method returns an editor sheet implementation for connection string expressions. 连接字符串表达式的编辑器表允许用户选择的连接名称和类型，基于当前的连接字符串中定义[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)部分Web 配置文件。The editor sheet for connection string expressions allows users to select a connection name and type, based on the current connection strings that are defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) section of the Web configuration file. 一旦用户选择了连接表达式属性后，编辑器表实现将合并的连接名称和为连接字符串表达式，返回到可视化设计器的类型。Once users have selected the connection expression properties, the editor sheet implementation combines the connection name and type into a connection string expression, which is returned to the visual designer.
